messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Mary-Ann's Corner
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Mary Ann is in the process of moving, so it might take time for her to answer. She presently unplugged from internet and will be without  stable connection
messages.messageBody:
Hi
Mary Ann is in the process of moving, so it might take time for her to answer. She presently unplugged from internet and will be without stable connection at least until mid-July. Yet, she might find the chance to get a computer and answer to you later.

BTW, these are my favorite guys in the NHK drama, though I have been told that Hijikata gets better and better since they arrive to Kyoto. I've watched only until episode 11, but I'm anxiously waiting for the last ones that have been aired in Japan.

take care
Firuze
----- Original Message -----
From: secretary
To: SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, June 21, 2004 4:11 PM
Subject: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Mary-Ann's Corner


now, I know the owner of the site should announce
this...secretarytocapt3 is going to be pushy and rude as usual I HAVE
TO POST THIS HERE ^_^

http://www.geocities.com/mary_anns_corner/index.html

From the ff.net author
http://www..fanfiction.net/profile.php?userid=374604

Please read her thoughts+opinions on RK Saitou vs Hist. Saito and
Nobuhiro Watsuki's concerns~because at one point or another every
fanfiction writer will deal with this issue
http://www.geocities.com/mary_anns_corner/saito.html

*(sec nudges mary-ann) I'm surprised you haven't completely fallen for
NHK Saitou...he's awesome! Nagakura is pretty cool too and Inoue
Genzaburo ~ don't you wish you had that kind of "help" at your house
^_^ he can make the tea, run errands and catch mysterious guys on your
property LOL!

[I posted a similar announcement at http://www.shinsengumimb.com]
